summary: Harley Quinn, the sweet yet psycho Clown Princess of Crime, has entered Skyrim and is armed with a mallet, puns, fourth wall breaking, and more insanity to liven up your playthrough! New voice acting and inspired by various iterations of the beloved femme fatale from the DC Universe!
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿﻿
[size=4][size=5][b][color=#85200C]♦ Description ♦[/color][/b][/size]
Harley Quinn, the beloved creepy cute villain and sometimes hero of the DC Universe, comes to Skyrim! Will you create chaos with her? Or will she help you do good for others? Maybe a bit of both? The choice is all yours!
Harley is a Breton of average height, with unnaturally pale skin and oddly colored hair. A notorious criminal murmured about by citizens of Tamriel, whether in fear, awe, or confusion, she is described as an oddly ... Sweet murderer. The eccentric young woman is a devout partner of the infamous Joker - a madman clad in clown attire, who kills for laughs - and is even nicknamed "the Joker's moll".
Her abilities are described as unnatural, with her immunity to poisons and diseases, as well as her above average human strength and agility, especially for a Breton. Harley Quinn bashes her enemies with a massive mallet and is skilled in the ways of one-handed weapons and bows. 
A wanted woman with many crimes to pay for, she is hiding in Skyrim with her beloved nowhere to be found. She is taking refuge in [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Anise%27s_Cabin][/url][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Anise%27s_Cabin][/url][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Anise%27s_Cabin]Anise's cabin[/url].
[/size][size=4][color=#85200C]
[size=5][b]♦ Details ♦[/b][/size][/color]
Age: 20s
Body: UNP
Essential: Yes
Height: 0.96
Weight: 0.80
Race: Breton
Skills: Archery, Light Armor, One-Handed Weapons, Two-Handed Weapons
Weapons: mallet, knife

[b][color=#900000][size=5]♦ Requirements ♦[/size][/color][/b]
* This mod is standalone, but for her SMP hair, you need to have [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88416]SMP-HDT[/url]﻿ installed for it to work (find it in the files; drag the SKSE folder into the Data folder, then the Skyrim folder to the main directory where the Skyrim program is)
If it gives you any issues, you can simply replace the .esp with a version that doesn't have the hair. This may not work well on all computers.

﻿[/size][size=4][size=4][b][color=#900000][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size][b] [/b][color=#85200C][size=5][b]Load Order[/b] [/size][/color][size=4][b][color=#900000][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size]
* I'd recommend having this mod high up in the load order, before any location-editing ones, just to be safe
[size=5]
[b][color=#85200C][size=4][b][color=#900000][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size] Compatibility[/color][/b][/size] [size=4][b][color=#900000][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size]
* May not be compatible with mods editing Anise's cabin; if you have one, try loading my .esp before it
* This follower has its own follower framework, so she is not compatible with any follower framework overhauls like EFF, AFT, UFO, etc.; however, if you use the dialogue version of the EFF menu, it works well, except for making her wait after asking her to do a favor[size=5].

[b][color=#85200C][size=4][b][color=#85200C][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size] Installation[/color][/b][/size] [size=4][b][color=#85200C][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size]
[b][u]Please backup your save before giving her a go! This mod uses scripts![/u][/b]
Please use a mod manager like NMM or Mod Organizer to download it. It's way easier to manage that way.

[size=4][b][color=#85200C][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size] [color=#85200C][b][size=5]Uninstallation[/size][/b][/color] [size=4][b][color=#85200C][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size]
Uninstall with the mod manager you're using.
I can't support manual un-installation. Sorry.
Before continuing your game, please either
A. Use your backup save before you installed the mod and continue your playthrough.
B. Follow these steps (not guaranteed to work)
1. Make sure you have dismissed Harley
2. Go to an interior away from her
3. Save
4. Quit
5. Uninstall
6. Open Skyrim[center]﻿﻿
[size=4][size=5][b][color=#85200C]♦ Description ♦[/color][/b][/size]
Harley Quinn, the beloved creepy cute villain and sometimes hero of the DC Universe, comes to Skyrim! Will you create chaos with her? Or will she help you do good for others? Maybe a bit of both? The choice is all yours!
Harley is a Breton of average height, with unnaturally pale skin and oddly colored hair. A notorious criminal murmured about by citizens of Tamriel, whether in fear, awe, or confusion, she is described as an oddly ... Sweet murderer. The eccentric young woman is a devout partner of the infamous Joker - a madman clad in clown attire, who kills for laughs - and is even nicknamed "the Joker's moll".
Her abilities are described as unnatural, with her immunity to poisons and diseases, as well as her above average human strength and agility, especially for a Breton. Harley Quinn bashes her enemies with a massive mallet and is skilled in the ways of one-handed weapons and bows. 
A wanted woman with many crimes to pay for, she is hiding in Skyrim with her beloved nowhere to be found. She is taking refuge in [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Anise%27s_Cabin]Anise's cabin[/url].
[/size][size=4][color=#85200C]
[size=5][b]♦ Details ♦[/b][/size][/color]
Age: 20s
Body: UNP
Essential: Yes
Height: 0.96
Weight: 0.80
Race: Breton
Skills: Archery, Light Armor, One-Handed Weapons, Two-Handed Weapons
Weapons: mallet, knife

[b][color=#900000][size=5]♦ Requirements ♦[/size][/color][/b]
* This mod is standalone, but for her SMP hair, you need to have [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88416]SMP-HDT[/url]﻿ installed for it to work (find it in the files; drag the SKSE folder into the Data folder, then the Skyrim folder to the main directory where the Skyrim program is)
If it gives you any issues, you can simply replace the .esp with a version that doesn't have the hair. This may not work well on all computers.

﻿[/size][size=4][size=4][b][color=#900000][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size][b] [/b][color=#85200C][size=5][b]Load Order[/b] [/size][/color][size=4][b][color=#900000][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size]
* I'd recommend having this mod high up in the load order, before any location-editing ones, just to be safe
[size=5]
[b][color=#85200C][size=4][b][color=#900000][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size] Compatibility[/color][/b][/size] [size=4][b][color=#900000][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size]
* May not be compatible with mods editing Anise's cabin; if you have one, try loading my .esp before it
* This follower has its own follower framework, so she is not compatible with any follower framework overhauls like EFF, AFT, UFO, etc.; however, if you use the dialogue version of the EFF menu, it works well, except for making her wait after asking her to do a favor

[size=5]
[b][color=#85200C][size=4][b][color=#85200C][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size] Installation[/color][/b][/size] [size=4][b][color=#85200C][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size]
Please backup your save before giving her a go! This mod uses scripts!
Please use a mod manager like NMM or Mod Organizer to download it. It's way easier to manage that way.

[size=4][b][color=#85200C][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size] [color=#85200C][b][size=5]Uninstallation[/size][/b][/color] [size=4][b][color=#85200C][size=5]♦[/size][/color][/b][/size]
Uninstall with the mod manager you're using.
I can't support manual un-installation. Sorry.
Before continuing your game, please either
A. Use your backup save before you installed the mod and continue your playthrough.
B. Follow these steps (not guaranteed to work)
1. Make sure you have dismissed Harley
2. Go to an interior away from her
3. Save
4. Quit
5. Uninstall
6. Open Skyrim
7. Save
8. Quit
9. Use a script cleaner to remove any leftover scripts
10. Run Skyrim
11. Wait for 30 days (just in case) to reset everything
12. Save
13. Hopefully, you're good to go![/size][/center]
[/size]
[size=4][size=4][size=5][b][color=#85200C][size=4][size=5]♦[/size][/size] Q & A[/color][/b][/size][color=#85200C][b] [size=4][size=5]♦[/size][/size][/b][/color]
[color=#BF9000]Q. Why is her face black?[/color]
[color=#6aa84f]A. This is a vanilla Skyrim bug; you can fix it by opening the console
(~), clicking on Harley, typing "setnpcweight 80", typing "disable",
then "enable".[/color]
[color=#BF9000]Q. Her HDT hair doesn't move![/color]
[color=#38761D][color=#6aa84f]A. Make sure you have the SMP PE path installed properly.[/color]
[/color][color=#BF9000]Q. Her teeth clip through her mouth sometimes![/color]
[color=#6aa84f]A. You may want to install [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303]Female Facial Animations[/url]﻿, and then the teeth mesh from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]﻿ (in that order).
[color=#BF9000]Q. Help! She's disappeared![/color]
A. Go into an interior somewhere. She'll pop up. Sorry. That's the best I can do.
[/color][color=#BF9000]Q. The voice is annoying.[/color]
[color=#6aa84f]A. Then don't download it. :3[/color]
[color=#BF9000]Q. She's not sexy enough![/color]
[color=#6aa84f]A. If you want, you can use a different Harley follower or make your own
to replace my follower's looks with the VNPC data tool. Sorry, but I am
not interesting in making a super skimpy/NSFW Harley mod.
[/color][color=#BF9000]Q. I tried to talk to her, but was interrupted and now I can't talk to her all.[/color]
[color=#6aa84f]A. You'll need to load a previous save. Sorry about that. OnO[/color]
[color=#BF9000]Q. My game crashed![/color]
[color=#6aa84f]A. Check for any conflicts. Use TES5Edit to check out your load order. My mod has no errors or anything that would cause this.[/color]
[size=5]
[/size][/size][/size][size=4][b][color=#85200C][size=5]♦ Credits ♦[/size][/color][/b]
(note: NSFW need to be Googled)

~Accessories/Armor/Clothes~
* [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81073?tab=files]Apachii Divine Elegance Store by Apachii and Urshi[/url]﻿ [for UNP versions of equippable colored nails]
[i]Note: Written permission was given to me by Apachii to use them[/i]
* [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14146/]Ashara Dimonized Dress by SydneyB[/url]﻿ [For diamond (falmer eye) choker]
[/size][size=4]* PeroPeroArmor7B by GomaPero [for heart goggles; edited by chickmetalhead and I]
[/size][size=4]* [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59867]Tes4Mod for Skyrim by akatuki408[/url]﻿ and others [for the "western muffler" and "aily gloves"; fixed textures by chickmetalhead]
* [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62683]The Jester's Jubile[/url]﻿ by Kryliss; edited meshes by me [for the jester-themed bodice, skirt, tights, mask, and their textures]
The above mod used these mods as well
+ [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40626]Lady Templar by Severus616[/url]﻿
+ [url=https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwjL38nJ0s_cAhVLzVMKHYMjATgQFjAAegQIBBAB&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fmods%2F33144%2F&usg=AOvVaw1HslbmPJHC4kb1JOWvxIiF]A Perfect Assassin by NewerMind43[/url]
+ [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/]UNP Minidresses Collection by Tiwa44[/url]﻿[/size][size=4]
[/size][size=4]* UNPB Kotobukiya Harley Quinn by doublezero; edited meshes and textures optimized by me [for Harley's classic, OG suit and mallet]

~ Body ~

﻿

TheK8iKat

[color=#741B47][b][i][size=5]~Special Thanks To~
*[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/41798335] BoneTongue[/url]﻿, for giving an easy to understand tutorial called with his mod resource [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84717]MACFKit[/url]﻿, for custom voiced NPCs that actually WORKS
*[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/28059195] triptherift[/url]﻿, for being the first to give my public Harley voice demo a thumbs up and giving support, which encouraged me
*[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/25051294] chickmetalhead[/url]﻿, for testing out my mod, fixing some meshes, fixing lines, giving advice, and providing AMAZING support, as well as beautiful screenshots
* [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1102501]Kris Takahashi [/url]﻿for inspiring me with his 3DNPC mod and giving me tips
* <Mystic Stranger> who gave epic feedback on my first demo vid
* [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/videos/5125]Skyla[/url]﻿ for her easy custom standalone follower resource and tutorial
*SpyVSPie for the compliments and suggestions to use the heart goggles from PeroPeroArmorPack7B
* Bethesda, for this wonderful, customizable game
* All modders whose assets I have used in this mod; your kindness has helped me bring my vision to life
* My boyfriend for putting up with my silly obsessions and listening to me ramble about mods <3[/size][/i][/b]
[/color]

Disclaimer:
I am in no part affiliated with DC comics. All assets from this mod are either made or edited by me, by modders with their permission, or from the Skyrim game.
Original character created by Paul Dini and Bruce Timm, property of DC Comics and Warner Bros.[/size][size=4]
[/size][color=#85200C]
[/color][/center][center][size=4][color=#85200C][b][size=5]Permissions:
PLEASE DO NOT RE-UPLOAD THIS MOD TO ANY OTHER SITES.
PLEASE DO NOT USE ANY ASSETS IN THIS MOD WITHOUT PERMISSION.
[/size][/b][size=5][b]Patches, translations, appearance changes, and other add-ons [u][i]requiring[/i][/u] this mod are fine[size=4]. [size=5]You do not need permission for that.[/size][/size][/b][/size][/color]
[b][color=#85200C][size=5]If you want to use my voice files for something, please PM me.
Thank you.[/size][/color][/b][/size][/center]
author: TheK8iKat
